title: Non-chan no Tenohira
original_name: のんちゃんの手のひら
sinopse:
After three years of infertility, a child is finally conceived, but a blood test taken without much thought reveals the child has a high risk of Down syndrome. However, Yuki decides to have the child. The story chronicles the struggles of raising a disabled child. This work has received high praise with child.

(Source: Jmanga)
